game.name: Sprocket
game.shortDescription: Carefully balance mobility, firepower and armour in a dedicated tank designer. Then uncarefully put them to the test in a series of combat scenarios progressing through the ages of the tank. Here, your limit is what you can fit inside your hull and turret while still being able to move forwards.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Carefully balance mobility, firepower and armour in a dedicated tank designer. Then uncarefully put them to the test in a series of combat scenarios progressing through the ages of the tank. Here, your limit is what you can fit inside your hull and turret while still being able to move forwards.

reviewHighlights.text: everything about the game is alright except for the advanced armor design... which is a decent chunk of the entire game for me because I find CAD soft...
i can see how this would be fun but you need to understand so much to have fun and there is no guides that i found
